snakes

Interface ISquare

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FirstSquare, Ladder, LastSquare, RollAgain, SlowDown, Snake, Square

    public interface ISquare
    This Interface promulgates Square. It allows to connect multiple Squares.

    It contains the following headers

    Author:
    Peter Allemann & Mathias Fuchs

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void enter(Player player)
      Accepts a player object on the container.
      boolean isFirstSquare()
      Determine whether the actual Square is the first Square
      boolean isLastSquare()
      Determine whether the actual Square is the last Square
      boolean isOccupied()
      Determine whether this container is occupied or not.
      ISquare landHereOrGoHome()
      invokes isOccupied(), if isOccupied() true then returns the player object to the first square.
      void leave(Player player)
      Removes the current player object from the container.
      ISquare moveAndLand(int moves)
      finds the square where the player object should be moved to.
      int position()
      Return the position of the Player object

    • Method Detail

      • position

        int position()
        Return the position of the Player object
        Returns:
        Position of Player object

      • moveAndLand

        ISquare moveAndLand(int moves)
        finds the square where the player object should be moved to. invokes landHereOrGoHome().
        Parameters:
        moves - the moves which a player object moves.
        Returns:
        ISquare ISquare of the destination

      • isFirstSquare

        boolean isFirstSquare()
        Determine whether the actual Square is the first Square
        Returns:
        true if the container is the first Square. count == 0, false otherwise

      • isLastSquare

        boolean isLastSquare()
        Determine whether the actual Square is the last Square
        Returns:
        true if the container is the last Square. count == 0, false otherwise

      • enter

        void enter(Player player)
        Accepts a player object on the container.
        Parameters:
        player - the player object to be accepted on the field

      • leave

        void leave(Player player)
        Removes the current player object from the container.
        Parameters:
        player - the player object to be removed from the container

      • isOccupied

        boolean isOccupied()
        Determine whether this container is occupied or not.
        Returns:
        true if the container is occupied: count == 0, false otherwise

      • landHereOrGoHome

        ISquare landHereOrGoHome()
        invokes isOccupied(), if isOccupied() true then returns the player object to the first square. If the container is empty count == 0 , false then it returns the current square.
        Returns:
        ISquare object
